EmailTemplate.name: Application Form Completion Remainder
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: We need some documents to complete your application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Quote.Applicant_1_Full_Name__c},
Congratulations! Your application is complete and we’re working on it.
Thank you for completing your application via Parker Lane.
We have received your application and will be in touch shortly.
If you haven’t already uploaded them, we may need some documents so the lender can validate your application.
To upload some or all of this information from your phone or PC now please follow this link below. It’s incredibly easy to use - no scanning required. You can even:
Point and shoot from your phone Link bank accounts online
Please click the button below to get started.
START UPLOADING NOW
If you have any questions about this email please don't hesitate to call us on 1300 131 711, or simply reply to this email.
Thank you in advance for your prompt attention to this email.
Kind regards, The Parker Lane team
